A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As someone who saw the original in theaters\, this new chapter is mostly thoughtfully written and acted\, incorporating characters that reflect an ideal of a modern group of heroes who include (OMG!) STRONG WOMEN! The horror! Seriously\, this is the first remake that I have seen multiple times as an adult and my kids want to join - even my girly pre-teen daughter. It’s fun\, don’t miss it.
